name: 張家銘
objective:
根據工研院「預見2030科技大未來」問卷調查，未來最重要實現的科技場景，第一名是「無人機物流服務」。同區域訂貨靠無人機幾分鐘就能送達，改寫了物流產業。全球無人機的新聞能見度越來越高，對全球經濟發展的影響，日益重要。航太分析公司Teal Group針對商業無人機市場進行研究，預估全球無人機市場於2028年時預期將接近800萬架合計143億美元。主要原因是美國聯邦航空總署(FAA)主導領空開放的政策，形成商業上的應用大大增加。專業型無人機的服務應用相當多元，主要包括服務應用平台，物資運送，以及空中通訊平台。今年開始，將是擴大商業化應用市場的關鍵期。此外，國內新創公司已開始投入小型垂直起降(VTOL)載人航空器研發。預期未來全球無人機需求數量非常可觀，並逐步形成目前主流民用航空器外的另一個新興市場。
According to the questionnaire survey of "Foreseeing the Great Future of Science and Technology in 2030" by the Industrial Technology Research Institute, the most important technology scenario to be realized in the future is "UAV logistics service". Orders in the same area can be delivered within a few minutes by drones, rewriting the logistics industry. The visibility of global drone news is getting higher and higher, and its impact on global economic development is becoming increasingly important. Aerospace analysis company Teal Group conducts research on the commercial drone market. It is estimated that the global drone market is expected to be close to 8 million in 2028, totaling 14.3 billion U.S. dollars. The main reason is that the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) has led the airspace opening policy, which has greatly increased its commercial applications. The service applications of professional drones are quite diverse, mainly including service application platforms, material delivery, and air communication platforms. It is expected that this year will be a critical time for expanding the commercial application market. In addition, domestic start-up companies have begun to invest in the research and development of small vertical take-off and landing (VTOL) manned aircraft. It is expected that the global demand for drones will be very substantial in the future, and will gradually form another emerging market outside the current mainstream civil aircraft.
